| Improve this Doc View Source

ApplyPhoneFriendHelp()

Applies the "Phone Friend Help" feature. Determines the index of the current question. Retrieves the answers for the current question. Calculates the probability of the correct answer based on a preset value. Determines whether the helper is correct based on a random number comparison with the probability of the correct answer. Determines the index of the answer to highlight for the phone friend help. Resets the phone friend help status and highlights the answer for the phone friend help.

Declaration
public void ApplyPhoneFriendHelp()
| Improve this Doc View Source

Changes the background color of the answer based on correctness.

Declaration
public void ChangeAnswerBackground(bool correct, int answerIndex)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Boolean correct

A boolean value indicating whether the answer is correct.
System.Int32 answerIndex

An integer indicating the index of the answer.
| Improve this Doc View Source

DisplayCurrentQuestion()

Displays the current question. Retrieves a random question from the collection of questions and presents it to the user. Sets the topic name, question text, and answer options for the current question. Activates the buttons for selecting answers and starts a timer for the question.

Declaration
public async void DisplayCurrentQuestion()
| Improve this Doc View Source

GetUserRank()

Retrieves the user's rank by requesting the score from the rank repository. If the request is successful, the actual score is updated.

QuestionTimer_Tick(Object, EventArgs)

Decrements the time left by one, updates the clock property, and checks if the time is up. If the time is up, it stops the question timer, displays a message box, and proceeds to the next question.

Declaration
public void QuestionTimer_Tick(object sender, EventArgs e)

System.EventArgs e

| Improve this Doc View Source

StartGame()

Starts the game by checking if the questions list is null or empty. If so, sets the Updated flag to false and displays an error message. Otherwise, sets the Updated flag to true, resets the colors, and initializes the score and various help statuses. Displays the current question.

Declaration
public void StartGame()
| Improve this Doc View Source
